Package org.micromanager.display

Interface ComponentDisplaySettings

  • public interface ComponentDisplaySettings
    Certain cameras (such as RGB cameras) can produce images where each pixel has multiple components. This inteface determines how these components should be displayed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  ComponentDisplaySettings.Builder
      Interface for ComponentDisplaySettings Builder.
